dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I see you trespassing in my realm, mortal. What brings you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Oh, a curious one. Knowledge will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm. Can we not coexist?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? In this darkness, only power prevails. Submit or perish.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to submit and learn from you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Submission accepted. Your servitude begins now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to submit. I will leave this place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Refusal? Pitiful. You shall not leave alive.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power to protect myself. Can you aid me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power-seeker. If you can prove your worth in combat, perhaps.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove my worth in combat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold choice. Let our strengths clash then.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I prefer not to fight. I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful departure? How disappointingly boring.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense darkness within you. Are you not tired of this eternal night?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Darkness is my essence. Tired? A concept unknown to shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will bring light to your darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light? A futile attempt. Darkness devours all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respect your darkness and take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? A rare trait. Leave before you become dust.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come to challenge your authority, creature of shadows!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge? Bold words from a fragile being. Let us see your mettle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My will is strong. I will not kneel before you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness. It will be your downfall, defiant one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand and fight you, shade stalker!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fight? A fruitless endeavor. Your end approaches swiftly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat for now, but I will return stronger.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat? Cowardice suits you well. Return if you dare.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my brash words. I seek a peaceful resolution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apology? Rare in these dark lands. Speak, then.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us form an alliance and unite our powers.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliance? An unexpected proposal. Perhaps there is potential.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can rule this realm as equals.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Rule? An intriguing notion. Let destiny decide.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you in peace. Farewell, shade stalker.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace. A concept worth preserving. Farewell, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave your domain. No further conflict is needed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Departure? Wise choice. Your presence is no longer required here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to prove your strength against mine!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge accepted, foolish mortal. Prepare for your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will show you the light within my darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light within darkness? An amusing fantasy. Prepare for annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Our conflict serves no purpose. Let us cease this battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cease? Weakness incarnate. The battle shall end you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to claim your realm for my own, shadow wraith!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Claim my realm? Arrogance knows no bounds in you, mortal fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your reign of darkness ends now, shade stalker!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: End my reign? Delusional defiance. Meet your doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your power and offer my allegiance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allegiance? A surprising proposal. Swear your loyalty then.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I pledge my loyalty to you, shadow wraith.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Loyalty sworn. Your fate is intertwined with shadows now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I withdraw my offer. I will depart in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Withdrawal? Wise or weak? Depart before shadows consume you.
